Garden Hose with Built-in Watering Can: Design a garden hose with a built-in watering can that allows users to water plants without having to stop and disconnect the hose. The watering can could be located at the end of the hose and have a small opening for water to flow out, making it easy to water plants without any hassle.

Smart Garden Hose: Create a garden hose with sensors and technology that can detect the water pressure and flow rate, providing users with real-time data on their water usage. This smart hose can also detect leaks and alert users to fix them, ensuring that water is used efficiently and waste is minimized.

Retractable Garden Hose: Design a garden hose with a retractable feature that allows users to easily store the hose when not in use. The hose could have a spring-loaded mechanism that allows it to retract into a compact housing, making it easy to store in small spaces.

Garden Hose with Built-in Fertilizer Dispenser: Create a garden hose with a built-in fertilizer dispenser that allows users to fertilize their plants as they water them. The dispenser could be located at the end of the hose and have a small opening for fertilizer to flow out, making it easy to apply fertilizer without any hassle.

Adjustable Garden Hose: Design a garden hose with an adjustable length feature that allows users to customize the length of the hose to suit their needs. The hose could have a series of adjustable sections that can be easily connected or disconnected, making it easy to use in different areas of the garden.
